overview:
A continuous learner of organisations and their structure and policy they bring into regulate work. Professional experience includes a decade long experience in HR with one of the largest power transmission company.

Interested in emerging issues and connecting those with the estblished fundamentals in the discipline. Interested in innovating with a group of like minded people and bring in the results into application in the workplace. Belives that theory and praxis complements each other. Being more specific, HR Policy and its internal and external fit with other functions, its everchanging and self renewing capabilities is the area of focus. Partnering for building up a responsible corporation with social commitments and its actualisation, and its overall itertwining in the policy framework has been an area of exposure.

An avid lover of Wild life, Soccer, Indian Classical Music and Kathakali, time outside work is devided between indulging in them and also with wife and kids. Reading the alltime favourites like Wodehouse and Marquez is also among the passtimes.
